data.description:
PvE: Any + Appended/Tac + Feeding Frenzy/Subsistence + Adrenaline Junkie/Rampage/KC
45 recoil direction is very low, so arrowhead would be a great choice. 16 base zoom is not too bad. 10 range stat points = 1.69M increase to range drop off

PvP: Hammer Forged/Smallbore/Polygonal/Arrowhead + Accurized/Steady Rounds + Tunnel Vision/DSR/(Heating Up?) + Tap the Trigger/KC/Thresh
